description: I. Agreement on facilities for industrial relations and trade union activities for members of the Prison Governors' Association. 11 p. II. Industrial staff : facilities for trade union representatives. 7 p. III. Trade unions and industrial relations : annex 1. National facilities agreement [DCA employee manual]. 12 p. IV. Prison officer grades : facilities for non-industrial representatives. 8 p. V. Agreement on facilities for industrial relations duties and trade union activities for non-industrial staff in the Home Office (accredited representatives and members of the trade unions represented on the trade union side of the departmental Whitley Council). 14 p.
